description: Non-contrast MRI of the lumbar spine

sections.name: EXAM
sections.content: MRI lumbar spine without intravenous contrast

technique.default_text: Multiplanar, multisequence MRI of the lumbar spine was performed without intravenous contrast.

content.normal_text: Normal lumbar lordosis is maintained. No listhesis.
Conus medullaris terminates at an appropriate level (L1-L2). Conus and cauda equina are normal in signal and morphology.
Vertebral body heights and marrow signal are preserved. No compression fracture.

content.normal_text_per_level: No disc herniation or significant degenerative change. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.

structured_format.L1-L2: Normal disc height and signal. No herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.
structured_format.L2-L3: Normal disc height and signal. No herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.
structured_format.L3-L4: Normal disc height and signal. No herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.
structured_format.L4-L5: Normal disc height and signal. No herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.
structured_format.L5-S1: Normal disc height and signal. No herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent.

content.normal_text: Facet joints are unremarkable. No ligamentum flavum hypertrophy.

options.text: Normal MRI of the lumbar spine.

herniation_types.description: Broad-based (>50% circumference) extension beyond disc margin
Focal (<50% circumference) extension, base wider than apex
Focal extension, apex wider than base
Free fragment, no continuity with parent disc

stenosis_grading.description: Minimal narrowing, CSF visible around thecal sac

normal_template.findings: Normal lumbar lordosis is maintained. No listhesis. Conus medullaris terminates at an appropriate level. Conus and cauda equina are normal. Vertebral body heights and marrow signal are preserved. No compression fracture. At all levels from L1-L2 through L5-S1, there is no disc herniation. Central canal and neural foramina are patent at all levels. Facet joints are unremarkable. Paraspinal soft tissues are unremarkable.
normal_template.impression: Normal MRI of the lumbar spine.
